name: Lorillard Tobacco Company v. Department of Treasury
name_abbreviation: Lorillard Tobacco Co. v. Department of Treasury

parties: Lorillard Tobacco Company v Department of Treasury,

opinions.text: Pursuant to MCR 7.302(H)(1), in lieu of granting leave to appeal, we vacate the judgment of the Court of Appeals and we remand this case to the Court of Appeals for reconsideration in light of 2014 PA 282.

casebody.head_matter:
Summary Disposition July 28, 2015:
Lorillard Tobacco Company v Department of Treasury,
No. 150664; Court of Appeals No. 313256.
